#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t,arr[1000],i,ct,sum1,c1,sum2,c2,j;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n;
cin>>n;
for(i=0;i<n;i++) 
{
                 cin>>arr[i];
}
cin>>ct;
sort(arr,arr+n);
sum1=arr[0];
sum2=arr[n-1];
if(sum1<=ct)
{
i=1;
c1=1;
}
else
{
    i=0;
    c1=0;
}
if(sum2<=ct)
{
            j=n-2;
            c2=1;
}
else
{
    j=n-1;
    c2=0;
}
while((sum1<ct || sum2<ct) && i<=j)
{
if(sum1<sum2) {sum1+=arr[i]; if(sum1<=ct) c1++,i++;}
else {sum2+=arr[j];if(sum2<=ct) c2++,j--;}
 
}
cout<<c2<<" "<<c1<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
